experience.description: Planning menus, overseeing the kitchen staff, and ensuring that the food meets high-quality standards. Managing the team of 15 people. Enforcing safety and sanitation standards in the kitchen. Keeping up to date with industry trends. Receiving feedback and making improvements where necessary.

Setting up workstations with all needed ingredients and cooking equipment. Preparing ingredients to use in cooking (chopping and peeling vegetables, cutting meat etc.). Cooking food in various utensils or grillers.
